weka.classifiers.functions

Class FAMR_Classification

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.classifiers.AbstractClassifier
      • weka.classifiers.functions.FAMR_Classification
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, weka.classifiers.Classifier, weka.core.BatchPredictor, weka.core.CapabilitiesHandler, weka.core.CapabilitiesIgnorer, weka.core.CommandlineRunnable, weka.core.OptionHandler, weka.core.RevisionHandler, weka.core.TechnicalInformationHandler

    public class FAMR_Classification
extends weka.classifiers.AbstractClassifier
implements weka.core.TechnicalInformationHandler, java.io.Serializable
    Implements a Bayesian ARTMAP.

      • 

        setOptions
        

        public void setOptions(java.lang.String[] options)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        

        
 Parses a given list of options.
 
 
 
        
  Valid options are:
 
 
 
         -p <double>
  the pmin threshold used in mapfield.
  (default 0.4)
 
        
 
 
         -a <double>
  the logarithm in base 10 of smaxa threshold used in art_a.
  (default 0)
 
        
 
 
         -b <double>
  the logarithm in base 10 of smaxb threshold used in art_b.
  (default -2)
 
        
 
        
         -logPath <String>
  the absolute path up to the log file
  (default Settings.logPath)
 
        
 
        
         -enableLog <boolean>
  whether the log is enabled
  (default false)
 
        
 
  
         -i <int>
  number of iterations on the training set
  (default 1)
 
        
 
 
        

        

        Specified by:
        

        setOptions in interface weka.core.OptionHandler
        

        Overrides:
        

        setOptions in class weka.classifiers.AbstractClassifier
        

        Parameters:
        

        options - the list of options as an array of strings
        

        Throws:
        

        java.lang.Exception - if an option is not supported
